mean_cn: n. 攻击，袭击；  v. 攻击，袭击，殴打
mean_en: the crime of attacking somebody physically; (by an army, etc.) the act of attacking a building, an area, etc. in order to take control of it; an act of criticizing somebody/something severely
sentence: The troops are conducting an assault on the enemy lines.
sentence_trans: 军队正在对敌方防线展开袭击。
word_etyma: as一再 + sault跳 → 跳起来 → assault进攻
